name: Dog Petting Sim
description:
Pet some randomly-generated dogs! They are friendly and will say nice things to you.

Featured dogs:
  • Lilly (golden retriever)
  • Carl (Pug)
  • Hermione (bouvier des flandres)
  • Jacquesimo (bouvier des flandres)
  • Mandy (dachshund)

Future versions will include more dogs!
